Comment.Language: For the second week of the month of Koiahk:

Text.Language: N~yok on akhwl: sa y/eyouab Maria: akhisennoufi nac: m~v~rasi m~pikocmoc.
You also flew to Saint Mary, and announced to her glad tidings of the joy of the world.
انت أيضاً طرت الي القديسة مريم وبشرتها بفرح العالم
Ouoh akws e~bol e~roc qen ouc~m/ n~yel/l: je ,ere y/e/meh n~h~mot ouoh P[oic sop neme.
And You cried out to her, with a voice of joy, saying: “Hail, O full of grace, the Lord is with you.”
وصرخت اليها قائلا السلام لك يا ممتلئة نعمة الرب معك.
